name: Thomas Sang
body:
### About Me
Born in New Brunswick NJ, raised in West Windsor NJ. Currently attending University of Illinois as a Junior majoring in Computer Science. Previous soccer referee and Starbucks shift supervisor.
*    Familiar with Java, Python, C++
*    Comfortable with SQL, JavaScipt
*    Experienced in cryptography and security

### Interests
I follow soccer and basketball regularly and the Superbowl on the side.  
I play basketball, soccer, and club badminton.  
Avid fan of Sherlock Holmes and the Halo universe.  
Intrigued by design, music, and my mom's food.

### Footprints
If you are looking for me on the web, you can find me at [facebook](https://www.facebook.com/thomas.sang), [twitter](https://twitter.com/Sang_default), and [Github](https://github.com/sang4-uiuc).

### Contact
Want to contact me about the site or something else? Hit me up at [tsang096@gmail.com](mailto:tsang096@gmail.com)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
